detaileddescription.para: Check if the CIG parameters are valid or not.

simplesect.para: True if parameter is valid, False otherwise.
True if all PHY are valid, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Check if the CIG test parameters are valid or not.

simplesect.para: True if parameter is valid, False otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Validate all test cis param PHYs.

simplesect.para: True if all PHY are valid, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Set up a new CIS or update an existing CIS.
Set up a new CIS or update an existing CIS for testing purpose.
Check whether the parameters for the CIG can be scheduled or not.

simplesect.para: TRUE if schedule is successful, otherwise FALSE.

briefdescription.para: Set up a new CIG for testing purpose.
Used by a master host to set the parameters of all connected isochronous streams associated with a connected isochronous group in the controller.
Set CIG parameters for testing purpose.
Used by a master Host to set the parameters of all connected isochronous streams associated with a connected isochronous group in the controller for testing purpose.
Used by the master host to establish one or more connected isochronous streams.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t *payload, uint8_t status, u8 cig_id, u8 num_cis)
memberdef.name: le_evt_pack_cig_params

briefdescription.para: Pack a set CIG parameters event.

parameterdescription.para: Number of CIS add or modified
